subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mueller, a singles hitter, helped set up Bobby Thomson’s 1951 pennant-winning home run and led the National League with 212 hits in 1954.
snippet: Mr. Mueller, a singles hitter, helped set up Bobby Thomson’s 1951 pennant-winning home run and led the National League with 212 hits in 1954.
